name: Little robot escape
description:
This is a small 2.5D platformer I made by myself as an assignment for Unity development as Futuregames school in Stockholm, Sweden. I made all the design, programming and music. The stand-alone version looks better, so please consider downloading!

Controls:

WASD, left controller stick or arrow keys for moving

Spacebar or primary controller button to jump

Esc or Start button to pause
